messages.content: How do I enable debug messages in cdxgen?
Set the environment variable CDXGEN_DEBUG_MODE to debug.
How do I pass additional options to the node runtime dynamically?
Use the CDXGEN_NODE_OPTIONS environment variable to pass additional NODE_OPTIONS.
How can I specify a GitHub token to prevent traffic shaping?
Set the GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable to your GitHub token.
How can I override the maven command?
Set the MVN_CMD environment variable to the desired command.
How can I pass additional arguments to maven, such as a profile or settings file?
Set the MVN_ARGS environment variable with the additional arguments.
How do I specify the Maven home directory?
Set the MAVEN_HOME environment variable to the Maven home directory.
How do I force cdxgen to use the cyclonedx-maven-plugin rather than maven dependency:tree?
Set the PREFER_MAVEN_DEPS_TREE environment variable to false.
How do I specify the URL of Maven Central for metadata fetching?
Set the MAVEN_CENTRAL_URL environment variable to the URL of Maven Central.
How do I specify the URL of the Android Maven Repository for metadata fetching?
Set the ANDROID_MAVEN_URL environment variable to the URL of the Android Maven Repository.
How do I provide additional arguments for the Bazel command?
Set the BAZEL_ARGS environment variable with the additional arguments.
How can I specify a Bazel target to build?
Set the BAZEL_TARGET environment variable. The default is :all.
How do I strip a Maven group prefix from Bazel dependencies?
Set the BAZEL_STRIP_MAVEN_PREFIX environment variable to the prefix you want to strip (e.g., /maven2/).
How to use action graph to get SBOM for specific Bazel target?
Set the BAZEL_USE_ACTION_GRAPH to true. Also ensure that the BAZEL_TARGET is set to specific bazel target.
How do I specify the Gradle cache directory?
Set the GRADLE_CACHE_DIR environment variable to the Gradle cache directory.
How do I pass additional arguments to Gradle (all tasks)?
Set the GRADLE_ARGS environment variable with the additional arguments.
How do I pass arguments only to the gradle properties task?
Set the GRADLE_ARGS_PROPERTIES environment variable with the additional arguments.
How do I pass arguments only to the gradle dependencies task?
Set the GRADLE_ARGS_DEPENDENCIES environment variable with the additional arguments.
How can I override the gradle command?
Set the GRADLE_CMD environment variable to the desired command.
How do I specify the Gradle home directory?
Set the GRADLE_HOME environment variable to the Gradle home directory.
How can I override the task name used to collect packages in Gradle?
Set the GRADLE_DEPENDENCY_TASK environment variable to override the default task name 'dependencies'.
How do I specify includedBuilds Gradle modules that should be scanned?
Set GRADLE_INCLUDED_BUILDS to a comma-separated list of modules (e.g., :module1,:module2). Use gradle-conventions for names.
How do I handle Gradle modules included from Node.js?
Set GRADLE_RESOLVE_FROM_NODE to true to use npm packages as dependencies for better purl generation.
How do I skip modules during the Gradle dependencies task?
Set GRADLE_SKIP_MODULE_DEPENDENCIES to a comma-separated list of modules to skip, using their Gradle names (e.g., :module1,:module2). Use "root" to skip the top module.
How do I skip modules for both properties and dependencies tasks in Gradle?
Set GRADLE_SKIP_MODULES to a comma-separated list of modules to skip. Note: Using this will prevent the ID and dependencies of these modules from being available.
How do I specify the directory for the Gradle user home?
Set the GRADLE_USER_HOME environment variable.
How do I specify the SBT cache directory?
Set the SBT_CACHE_DIR environment variable to the SBT cache directory.
How do I fetch license information from the registry?
Set the FETCH_LICENSE environment variable to true or 1.
How do I disable the search on search.maven.org for missing Maven metadata?
Set the SEARCH_MAVEN_ORG environment variable to false or 0.
How do I generate BOMs for golang projects using go.sum instead of go.mod?
Set the USE_GOSUM environment variable to true or 1.
How do I change the default timeout for maven, gradle or sbt?
Set the CDXGEN_TIMEOUT_MS.
How can I increase buffer size for stdout and stderr?
Set the CDXGEN_MAX_BUFFER environment variable. Defaults to 100MB.
How do I change the timeout value for the server mode?
Set the CDXGEN_SERVER_TIMEOUT_MS environment variable.
How do I specify the clojure CLI command?
Set the CLJ_CMD environment variable.
How do I specify the leiningen command?
Set the LEIN_CMD environment variable.
How do I configure BOM signing?
Set the SBOM_SIGN_ALGORITHM to a signature algorithm, SBOM_SIGN_PRIVATE_KEY to the private key and optionally, SBOM_SIGN_PUBLIC_KEY to include the public key in the SBOM signature.
How do I configure the CycloneDX Maven plugin?
Set CDX_MAVEN_PLUGIN and CDX_MAVEN_GOAL to the desired plugin and goal. CDX_MAVEN_INCLUDE_TEST_SCOPE controls whether test scoped dependencies are included.
How do I specify directories to ignore during babel analysis?
Set the ASTGEN_IGNORE_DIRS environment variable to a comma-separated list of directories. This variable is also used by atom and astgen.
How to set ignore regex pattern when parsing AST?
The variable ASTGEN_IGNORE_FILE_PATTERN can be used to pass ignore regex to use.
How do I override the default PyPi URL?
Set the PYPI_URL environment variable.
How do I override the default NPM registry URL?
Set the NPM_URL environment variable.
How do I override the default Go pkg URL?
Set the GO_PKG_URL environment variable.
How do I override the default Rust Crates URL?
Set the RUST_CRATES_URL environment variable.
How do I override the default NuGet URL?
Set the NUGET_URL environment variable to URL from registration hive "RegistrationsBaseUrl/3.6.0" at NuGet V3 API (https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json).
How do I specify an alternative path to the .docker directory?
Set the DOCKER_CONFIG environment variable to the alternative path.
How can I perform docker login prior to invoking cdxgen?
Set the DOCKER_AUTH_CONFIG environment variable to a Base64 encoded JSON with credentials, or set DOCKER_USER, DOCKER_PASSWORD, DOCKER_EMAIL, and DOCKER_SERVER_ADDRESS.
How do I override docker command?
Set DOCKER_CMD with desired docker command.
How can I use docker with tcp or ssh hosts?
Set DOCKER_HOST variable. docker cli would be used to pull the image.
How do I specify a directory for the certs for insecure registries with docker?
Set the DOCKER_CERT_PATH environment variable to the path containing cert.pem and key.pem.
How do I disable TLS verification for insecure registries with docker?
Set DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY to an empty value.
How can I increase the node heap size?
Set the NODE_OPTIONS environment variable (e.g., --max-old-space-size=8192).
How do I pass arguments to the npm install command?
Set the NPM_INSTALL_ARGS environment variable (e.g., --package-lock, --legacy-peer-deps).
How do I limit the automatic npm install count?
Set the NPM_INSTALL_COUNT environment variable. Default is 2.
How do I specify the compiler arguments to Swift semantic analysis?
Set the SWIFT_COMPILER_ARGS environment variable to the full compiler arguments string (e.g., -sdk <path> -F <path> -Xcc -I <path>). You can also use SWIFT_SDK_ARGS and SWIFT_COMPILER_EXTRA_ARGS.
How do I fetch vcs url from pkg.go.dev for golang?
Set the GO_FETCH_VCS to true or 1.
How do I specify the namespace for HTTP_PROXY variable usage?
Use GLOBAL_AGENT_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE_NAMESPACE variable.
How do I choose java tool version?
Use variables JAVA8_TOOL, JAVA11_TOOL, JAVA17_TOOL, JAVA21_TOOL, JAVA22_TOOL or JAVA23_TOOL to set desired version.
How do I define where cdxgen plugins are stored?
Use variable CDXGEN_PLUGINS_DIR. If not set, a global node_modules path is used.
How can I override global node modules path?
Set GLOBAL_NODE_MODULES_PATH to the path of the global node_modules directory.
How do I ignore directories when creating AST?
Set ASTGEN_IGNORE_DIRS to a comma-separated list of directories to ignore. Example: venv.
How do I indicate that the process is running inside a containerized environment?
Set CDXGEN_IN_CONTAINER to true.
How can I pass arguments to pip install?
Use PIP_INSTALL_ARGS to pass arguments to pip install (eg. --no-warn-conflicts).
How do I specify a target directory for pip installations?
Set PIP_TARGET to the desired target directory.
How do I disable canonical terminal settings for Node.js?
Set NODE_NO_READLINE to 1 to disable it.
How do I specify the path to save REPL command history?
Set the CDXGEN_REPL_HISTORY environment variable to the desired path.
How do I specify the SDKMAN version?
Set the SDKMAN_VERSION environment variable.
How do I define the directory of NVM (Node Version Manager)?
Use the NVM_DIR environment variable.
How do I define custom RBENV_CMD to use
Set RBENV_CMD with rbenv command to use.
How do I set the rbenv root directory for custom rbenv installations?
Use RBENV_ROOT environment variable for setting rbenv root directory.
How do I pass additional arguments to bundle install command?
Use BUNDLE_INSTALL_ARGS. Example: --redownload or --without=test.
How do I pass additional arguments to bundle update command?
Use BUNDLE_UPDATE_ARGS environment variable.
How do I customize the GEM_HOME directory to use, while collecting the module names for all the gems in deep mode?
Use the CDXGEN_GEM_HOME environment variable. This could be different from the system gems directory too. Can be used in addition to GEM_PATH environment variable too to improve the success rate.
How do I specify temporary directory for storing intermediate files during SBOM generation?
Use the CDXGEN_TEMP_DIR environment variable.
How do I disable using the cache option for the HTTP request agent?
Use the CDXGEN_NO_CACHE environment variable.
